amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 601. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for Payne Gallery, Moravian College in Pennsylvania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for Payne Gallery, Moravian College in Pennsylvania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A045) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A045) Failed by voice vote.
